sourcesuses.value: Used in paints, inks, plastics, rubber, cement, textile printing, and munitions; [HSDB]

comments.value: Stains skin; May be absorbed through the skin; [CAMEO] An irritant; May cause serious injury to eyes; Possible sensitizer; Injury to adrenal glands, thyroid, spleen, liver, bone marrow, and kidneys in high-dose animal experiments; [MSDSonline]

hepatotoxin.value: Hepatoxic (a) from occupational exposure (secondary effect) or (b) in animal studies or in humans after ingestion

processes.value: Industrial Processes with risk of exposure: Painting (Pigments, Binders, and Biocides) Textiles (Printing, Dyeing, or Finishing)
